channel.title: Object command
channel.description: Can anyone give me an object command To spawn objects please and thank you

item.dc:creator: @resident123 resident123
item.description:
@resident123 wrote:

Fixed Sorry or the mistake ::

item.title: Object command
item.dc:creator: @Czar_y2k Czar y2k
item.description:
@Czar_y2k wrote:

[quote=“resident123, post:5, topic:323822”][quote author=Czar y2k link=topic=420228.msg3086815#msg3086815 date=1262560578]
If you mean spawning an object heres a command for it,

if (command.startsWith("object") && playerRights >= 2) { try { int newObjectID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7)); if (newObjectID >= 0) { makeGlobalObject(absX, absY, newObjectID, heightLevel, 10); sM("You spawn an object"); } else { sM("No such Object"); } } catch(Exception e) { sM("Wrong Syntax! Use as ::object 1"); }
[/quote]
When i us hat iget100 errors [ information - im using boxingscape. ][/quote]

If thats 317 source as in very old runescape (2006ish), change “makeGlobalObject” to “makeWorldObject”. should work then hopefully, havent done 317s in long time, moved to 474 development.

Read full topic
